pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is the meta package to build .NET Core from the source code.
The subpackages of this meta package are
dev-dotnet/aspnetcore - Cross platform .NET framework for building cloud based apps dev-dotnet/cli - Build tools dev-dotnet/core - Contains examples and documentation dev-dotnet/coreclr - The runtime for .NET Core dev-dotnet/corefx - Contains class libraries to handle collections (data structures), xml, json, System.* namespace
You may also choose the precompiled version found in the dotnet overlay.
